Items.text: Hey, uhh. I'm gonna have to stay behind here.
Items.name: Norbert

Items.text: Can't go into your subconcious, I would abstract and disappear.
Items.name: Norbert

Items.text: Plus, I do have these boxes in here to finish cleaning up.
Items.name: Norbert

Items.text: Don't take what you see in there too seriously.
Items.name: Norbert

Items.text: Lots of weird things can show up in your subconcious.
Items.name: Norbert
